text: @realDonaldTrump @BankofAmerica @SBAgov @USTreasury /4, this crisis economically will be worse than 08’, b/c the financial end of recovery is being run as bad as the #COVID19 response!  Banks are in the dark, understaffed, apps will be lost, no guidance from WH, crooked Mnuchin or clueless @SecretaryCarson!  We’re in big trouble!
